data.title: Sororities at William & Mary
data.text:
Alpha Chi Omega,

Sorority

Chapter Name: Beta Delta

National Founding: October 15, 1885

Founding School: Depauw University, IN

Campus Founding: 1927

Nickname: Alpha Chi or A-Chi-O

Colors: Scarlet & Olive Green

Philanthropy: Domestic Violence Awareness

Chapter Homepage: {{http://axobetadelta.wix.com/wmalphachi}}

National Homepage: {{http://www.alphachiomega.org}}

Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Inc.,

Sorority

Chapter Name: Nu Chi

National Founding: January 15, 1908

Founding School: Howard University, D.C.

Campus Founding: 1981

Nickname: AKA

Colors: Salmon Pink & Apple Green

Philanthropy: Avalon and American Heart Association

Chapter Homepage:

National Homepage: {{http://www.aka1908.com}}

Chi Omega,

Sorority

Chapter Name: Omicron Beta

National Founding: April 5, 1895

Founding School: University of Arkansas, AR

Campus Founding: 1921

Nickname: Chi-O

Colors: Cardinal & Straw

Philanthropy: Make-A-Wish Foundation

Chapter Homepage: {{http://www.chiomegaomicronbeta.weebly.com}}

National Homepage: {{http://www.chiomega.com}}

Delta Delta Delta,

Sorority

Chapter Name: Alpha Mu

National Founding: November 28, 1888

Founding School: Boston University, MA

Campus Founding: 1928

Nickname: Tri-Delt

Colors: Silver, Gold & Gold

Philanthropy: St. Jude Children's Research Hospital

Chapter Homepage: {{http://wm.tridelta.org}}

National Homepage: {{http://www.tridelta.org}}

Delta Gamma,

Sorority

Chapter Name: Epsilon Mu

National Founding: December 25, 1873

Founding School: Lewis School, MS

Campus Founding: 1982

Nickname: DG

Colors: Bronze, Pink & Blue

Philanthropy: Service for Sight

Chapter Homepage: {{http://wm.deltagamma.org}}

National Homepage: {{http://www.deltagamma.org}}

Gamma Phi Beta,

Sorority

Chapter Name: Alpha Chi

National Founding: November 11, 1874

Founding School: Syracuse University, NY

Campus Founding: 1934

Nickname: Gamma Phi

Colors: Brown & Mode

Philanthropy: Girls on the Run

Chapter Homepage: {{http://gphiax.wix.com/gphiwm}}

National Homepage: {{http://www.gammaphibeta.org}}

Hermandad de Sigma Iota Alpha, Inc.,

Sorority

Chapter Name: Beta Delta

National Founding: September 29, 1990

Founding School: SUNY Albany, SUNY Stonybrook, SUNY New Paltz, Reansselaer Polytechnic Institute

Campus Founding: 2013

Nickname: SIA

Colors: Red, Gold & Royal Blue

Philanthropy: Children International, One Heartland, and Special Olympics

Chapter Homepage: {{http://www.wmsia.chapterspot.com}}

National Homepage: {{http://hermandad-sia.org}}

Kappa Alpha Theta,

Sorority

Chapter Name: Beta Lambda

National Founding: January 27, 1870

Founding School: Depauw University, IN

Campus Founding: 1922

Nickname: Theta

Colors: Black & Gold

Philanthropy: Court Appointed Special Advocates

Chapter Homepage: {{http://www.wmtheta.org}}

National Homepage: {{http://www.kappaalphatheta.org}}

Kappa Delta,

Sorority

Chapter Name: Alpha Pi

National Founding: October 23, 1897

Founding School: Longwood College, VA

Campus Founding: 1928

Nickname: KD

Colors: Olive Green & Pearl White

Philanthropy: Prevent Child Abuse America, Girl Scouts, Richmond Children's Hospital, and Avalon

Chapter Homepage: {{http://wm.kappadelta.org/}}

National Homepage: {{http://www.kappadelta.org}}

Kappa Kappa Gamma,

Sorority

Chapter Name: Gamma Kappa

National Founding: October 13, 1870

Founding School: Monmouth College, IL

Campus Founding: 1923

Nickname: Kappa

Colors: Light Blue & Dark Blue

Philanthropy: National Eating Disorders Association, Girl Up, and The Kappa Kappa Gamma Foundation

Chapter Homepage: {{http://wm.kappa.org}}

National Homepage: {{http://www.kappakappagamma.org}}

Phi Mu,

Sorority

Chapter Name: Gamma Alpha

National Founding: March 4, 1852

Founding School: Wesleyan College, GA

Campus Founding: 1926

Colors: Rose & White

Philanthropy: Childrenâ€™s Miracle Network Hospitals, Richmond Community Fridges, and Phi Mu Foundation

Chapter Homepage: {{http://wm.phimu.org}}

National Homepage: {{http://www.phimu.org}}

Pi Beta Phi,

Sorority

Chapter Name: Virginia Gamma

National Founding: April 28, 1867

Founding School: Monmouth College, IL

Campus Founding: 1925

Nickname: Pi Phi

Colors: Wine & Silver Blue

Philanthropy: Arc of Greater Williamsburg, Pi Beta Phi Foundation, and Read, Lead, Achieve

Chapter Homepage: {{http://www.pibetaphi.org/wm}}

National Homepage: {{http://www.pibetaphi.org}}
